title: FYRE: The Greatest Party That Never Happened
description:
Tig and Cheryl discuss Fyre: The Greatest Party That Never Happened, a doc chronicling the most infamous fiasco in music festival history. The duo make plans to save the swimming pigs, review potential lessons Tig could learn from "The Secret", and debate how to talk (or not talk) about the birds and the bees with their respective kids.
*This episode contains spoilers*
(tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)
